::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral jumps to the side, cursing his disabled jetpack as he's nearly 
hit by Motormaster. He lets loose two dozen laser shots from his 
cannon at the truck.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa jumps into the air, Motormaster hitting her in the feet but 
doing little damage. Her jetpack boosts her upward.

Aiming her missile launcher down, she fires two missiles at 
Motormaster.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "As you wish" Motormaster growls transforming to his truck mode and 
starts
> to back away in reverse. Then, abruptly he stops and starts to push 
his
> engine hard as he heads towards the small group of robots, Head on
> collision on his mind.
